alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:19PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Weld County through 200 PM MDT... At 119 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout tornado 9 miles northeast of Rockport, or 13 miles southeast of Cheyenne, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Landspout tornadoes can damage mobile homes, roofs, vehicles, and trees. Outdoor objects may be tossed about. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hereford. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If a tornado is spotted seek shelter inside a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
